title: General Prompt Template
description: The General Prompt Template is a simple, structured template for everyday AI tasks. It helps you clearly define your goal, inputs, and requirements so an LLM can respond more accurately and consistently.

title: Instruction Template
description: A reusable template for prompts where the user wants the AI to perform a sequence of ordered, structured steps, each with rules. This sub-prompt pattern can be used as-is or inserted into a main prompt when needed.

title: System Prompt Template
description: The System Prompt Template sets the role, behavior, and output style of an AI model so it responds consistently, follows rules, and communicates in a reliable, controlled manner across multiple tasks.
